header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.activity: Couple chat and have a bonfire.

body.u: and here we are crawling through the undergrowth in search of a greater spotted Dawn there she is sitting by the fire
steam
huh?
it's like a steam thing
yeah
ah it's boiling have you tried? Oh god
it's silly cos I'm wearing erm clean clothes as well these are going to stink
why are you wearing clean clothes to do gardening? Oh
shall we sit over the other side? The wind's blowing this way
well it's not at the moment but it will be yeah yeah which ever way I sit on the fire the wind follows me
huh
I think I'm jinxed
yeah it tends to do that doesn't it?
sit on this hill bit
yeah
I was thinking about my pond again cos that willow oh it's such a shame I wasn't here when that willow tree grew or that we hadn't been to that place in India where they had the willow bridges
yeah
Cos erm
yeah you could have bent that over couldn't you?
oh god when it was when it was growing when it was a baby look it even wants to go that way it's leaning that way already
that's willow is it?
I c well it's a weeping willow I don't know if that works I think what you need is one of those twisty windy ones
right so if you buried that on the other side it would grow
I think it will root
it will root?
I think it will root yeah well I don't know about that willow I know other the other willows do
huh
that would be cool it would be like a little art thing as well and it's in exactly the right place
yeah
yeah it's funny isn't it?
why?
it's a shame I was wondering if dad cuts it right the way down see what's happened to those trees over there?
mm
they just start sprigging around it's not dead but they just start new sprigs and then maybe we can twist it and wind it and make a bridge
mm mm
if I would I would do that
that would take years though wouldn't it?
no I don't think it took that long for that tree to grow well it would do from to make a sturdy bridge
yeah
yeah of coarse it would oh it would have been so cool it's just in the perfect place
hmm
God my face is roasting I think I've burnt my face off
it's hot here actually it's looking a bit red
it's good it's like a sauna isn't it? opens up all your pores I'll go and like splash it with cold water now to like get get in all the pours
yeah I love watching fires
I think did dad say anything I think we should watch it till it goes down or until it's ready for potatoes or something
putting potatoes in it?
I don't know mum wants to cook fish pie but
erm well I think it will be fine like that
well I think
it's not going anywhere is it? It's burnt off all the stuff
well I'd rather not I don't I don't want any piece at the edge to catch and then the grass all go and then we'll end up with a right old state I'm not to be blamed for that so I'm sitting here
okay
I'm going to sit until my fire is finished I feel like a right farmer look with my fork in my hand fork in my hand
you look like one what's that on your laces?
no that's just the laces they just all broke
oh
they've all come apart for some reason that's the inside of it looks like don't know it looks all fluffy look at that pond
yeah why has why hasn't the water taken to this? Why does it just drain?
Don't know oh maybe because it
Cos it's clay isn't it?
yeah
I thought clay was supposed to hold water

yeah that's what we thought when we dug it it's all clay soil around here I don't know and mum and dad they pa paddled is it paddle it? You know like like you do with grapes but you do with a bottom of a pond
oh I don't know
paddle it poddle it
poddle it
I don't know pondle it no you know they get their wellies and they like squelching it around to try and make a seal with the with the clay
yeah and it hasn't worked
it doesn't want to take but it it is getting a little bit more water every year but maybe it's cos of the drought
What half a half a centimetre
hm well there was quite a bit in there the other day
was there?
when we had all that rain yeah
yeah but he's got a hose leading from the runoff as well
yeah
so that's why it's got
yeah what the runoff off the shed? Yeah
I suppose if he keeps burning stuff in it it's gonna create a seal isn't it?
but it you've got to think oh I don't know is that why he's doing it?
that's the idea that's that's why he's burning it I think so
but what about that part of it?
well I don't know well I think he's going to move onto that bit he said
oh I didn't know that's what why we always had our bonfires here because we used to have our bonfires there
yeah it makes sense though doesn't it?
I just thought it was a nice place because it it was all indented in the thing
well that as well
I don't know
hmm
oh we should get some frogs and stuff here though hopefully
mm
do you know I spent I I shaped this pond I like I was they said if you want a pond you're going to have to dig erm an outline
mm
for it

so I dug the out the outline and I said I wanted it like this with a little bridge going across there that was my my dre I had to draw a p you know what mum and dad are like I had to draw up plans and everything this is what I'm going to do
mm
here this is what it's going to look like I did all of that then I then I dug all the way around the outside of this this is the shape and then dad brought the digger in
mm mm

and we found the end of the hose pipe right there it was perfect that we could just just get cos erm yeah the runoff from the shed the hosepipe is actually underground and it comes all the way up to here
the hose is underground?
yeah cos we used to have the goat sheds there until they all burnt down
yeah
they all burnt down so we had water
oh okay
from I think it was from the dai
ah
from the dairy coming down to feed the goat sheds
yeah
and so there was a a hose pipe underground there and we dug the pond just in the right place and we found the end of the hose pipe it was really lucky
ah that is lucky

and it was like this is fate this is what this is what the po where the pond should be but alas it doesn't want to be but anyway yeah and then and then we brought in the digger to dig out the rest but I'd dug it took me took me months every weekend and I was only like fourteen or something
Oh mm hmm

actually no I think that was the I think that might have been the summer that I was grounded when I was sixteen actually I think it might have been the summer I was really I was grounded so I was here and I wasn't allowed out all summer so I had nothing to do but try and dig a pond
hmm mm
that was exiting summer wasn't it? sweet sixteen
mm I think I spent the summer when I was sixteen down the golf course drinking cider
well that's why I was grounded that's why I had to dig a pond
yeah I know
It's funny isn't it what you used to do?
yeah do kids still do that now?
yeah in the parks
I never notice it
that's cos you never go around the parks late at night you wouldn't want to go like you just avoid them don't you? You're like oh god I'm not going to go in there
mm yeah I suppose
like bless them they're only like a bunch of kids hanging out most of the time they're not bad kids most of the time but I mean yeah maybe they're having a drink or a smoke or something like that but
well yeah it was only because I didn't have anything else to do
yeah
and that was the only interaction with
that's what I mean you see these gangs
it was the only interaction with girls I ever had
what girls did you meet then?
well drunk ones oh look at that
ah it's a shrew
it's a shrew
ah he was a hoppy shrew wasn't he?
did he just come out of the fire?
no he came from the other side I don't know what's he doing out here?
hmm
so what girls did you meet down the park?
oh no one special just er I don't know at that age you just want to well I did I just wanted to get drunk and flirt with girls really but usually I got too drunk and ended up vomiting everywhere
and never got it with the girls
yeah
Cos you're too drunk
yeah it's stupid isn't it? Can we just walk around and erm think about where we're going to put these tents?
okay don't let me forget my fork
right so I think so far we've got erm don't know how many people have confirmed a tent?
well I think we've got fourteen tents
fourteen
but it's like we're trying
I don't know how how big are these tents though?
yeah I know I tried to clear up all those sticks right down here this is where
well we've got a few months to get rid of these twigs and stuff
yeah well what if we go away? We won't be able to do it will we?
well no but we're going to be back beginning of August aren't we? so
right well there's some space there you can fit maybe three
yeah that's one two three yeah
three maybe four
mm mm
okay th this is our our space
yeah but I was thinking about that cos you said that but this guy here next door he works until about two in the morning and all these big floodlights are on
yeah I want oh
so are you really going to want to?
well it depends he doesn't always
yeah but he might be doing loads of work there and then it's well it's not going to be very peaceful and that shed scares the crap out of me as well
okay let's put down here then and they can have their own section
what this is where the?
the drunkards come
mm yeah
yeah yeah will love it there put and there
yeah no I don't mind going down there cos it is a bit cut off isn't it? it is quite nice
yeah that's what I thought would be nice
yeah
I thought that would be nice just us down here you know cos I know it's a only a party but I'd like to be
yeah
and then this can all be our this will all all arch over all of these trees will be beautiful
mm mm
it will be like a little cove and you'll have to like duck to get under here
yeah well I just love this old truck and that shed they're so
well do you want to sleep in the old truck?
I don't know you might have to kick some badgers out what is that in there?
we could sleep in here tables tables and chairs and look we've got hundreds of chairs and a bench we have to fix all these up look
are these chairs okay?
yeah
see you could imagine all sorts going on in here can't you? In the party
so you don't want to sleep in here?
well I don't want to sleep in here no but I can imagine people creeping in here getting up to stuff
well they can have a bit of fun it's alright
please put coins here What's that for?
or call round for change that's when they used to sell the pumpkins out the front we had to stop doing it because everybody nicked it and nicked the money
bastards
oh we can shall we sleep in here?
huh this is cool isn't it? this no
why not?
well I suppose you could do couldn't you?
then if it rains we won't have a problem I mean we could even put we could put the tent in here if you want like to save us cleaning it
but where are you going to put the ground pegs?
we won't need it because there won't be any wind it's got a ground sheet on it no just to you know make it clen clean and homely rather than in the truck
you need a mattress
it's massive isn't it?
it is they should do something with this what could you do in here? Cos it's like completely secret isn't it?
it's a storage truck
it could be they could grow some weed in here if you get the lighting
mm I don't think they would want to
it could be er some big Norfolk producers
drugs bust well what do you reckon? Do you want to sleep in there?
that's brilliant that is er I don't know what does it look like in summer because you've got all of this stuff on top of it is it? It looks like it's going to collapse
why would it collapse?
well the weight of all that stuff foliage on top
no
no?
no
well I suppose it's been there how many years? It reminds me of those er temples in Angkor Wat Angkor
yeah
with all the plants and trees growing out of them
mm it's cool isn't it? I remember putting this here
huh
if you see on the side that's where we painted Let's see which van is this?
this used to be the health food van?
yeah the fruit and vegetable van see if we cut off that other side then they'll only be one secret pathway for over there and maybe we could just keep that for ourselves
you've got secret pathways everywhere there you go what does that say?
it says furnishing

well it's an old furniture truck isn't it?
I thought it was an old library van the other one was an old library van
yeah alright well you've got so one three four five six here

and then we're going to have to light up around the pond
but like you said right look nobody can pitch a tent here look

it is a bit bumpy isn't it?
yeah

well I don't know what we're going to do
how far does your garden go? Does that?
just to there that's the end this is the end and the potter who lives over there she walks through sometimes with her dog doesn't she? There's the owl box
yeah yeah cos he had to cut those
gosh you know that's an actual pathway now
that is a pathway yeah
because they've walked it so many times
I've I've never seen her come through I saw her last year
have you not?
is that her workshop?
yeah but apparently her daughter and her daughter's husband have moved in with a new baby yeah half the workshop is their house now
oh really?
yeah and they seem the same age as us
oh
Don't know why we've not been introduced really
yeah cos that owl box you had to cut all the trees down in front of it because the owls need er like a runway otherwise they won't take to it
really?
yeah so that that bit of branch hanging down there is probably stopping one from moving in
oh I see
because they come in like a plane and they need
well I could get oh it's just too high isn't it?
yeah
you need the ladder what you reckon that branch is stopping their runway?
huh?
just that little one there
er no this one here
yeah
yeah that one
yeah oh I'd love an owl to move in I heard one the other day though and it sounded really weird so

right do you reckon this fire is done now?
I reckon that will be alright
yeah?
but I don't know what to do about these tents it depends how much people drink really isn't it?

no
oh they they'll have to just
it will be alright god you can rough it for one night can't you?
yeah but some of these holes in the land are incredibly bumpy

well cos we've got all that down there as well to the hill that we could use
well like you know all those twigs aren't there I suppose

we've got some?

no they don't they're slightly different
they do

this is very flat
er well

purple broccoli

nice

what the mice had been eating them?

yeah stupid mice they were in the greenhouse and then ah there was all these holes so I went to say I I was coming to check on them I though mum had dug some out and replanted it somewhere else or something it had sprouted or something like that
hmm
she was like what are you talking about there's holes? Then mice mice mice holes that's why they're on this plastic sheet

so that hopeful so that mice can't get up here
well do you think these are going to come up or are they?
they literally just took the bulbs out had eaten bulbs there was just holes where the mice had dug and eaten the bulbs
oh so all these are just empty pots?
well I don't know that's what we're worried we're worried about but you know there wasn't holes in all of it so the mice couldn't have eaten them all
well I hope not or else we're going to have no flowers
I hope not cos well it took us ages to grow them
yeah hmm
